1464180.name: Coven
1464180.description:
It is an Age of Darkness, ruled by a corrupt Theocracy. The structure of law and order has collapsed, plunging England into its darkest period. Witch Finders commissioned to uncover and prosecute witches roam the countryside.

As a young orphan girl, you’ve always had a gift. An occult power which you’ve kept a secret for all of your life. After being falsely accused of Witchcraft and sentenced to death, an unforeseen twist of fate sets you free again, but your life as you knew it is over. Hunted by the King’s henchmen, you set off on a harrowing journey to unlock your supernatural powers, and discover the occult mysteries surrounding your hidden past.





  • A mature dark-fantasy tale with classic horror themes.
  • Detailed animations and cinematic visual effects, with 640×360 graphics resolution.
  • An epic musical score and thrilling sound effects.
  • Characters fully voiced by professional actors.
  • Over 100 different locations to discover, illustrated and brought to life with animated effects.
1464180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
